column4: what do i need to isntall internet explorer on my ubuntu 10.04?
You don't need internet explorer, but if you *really* want it, which is *very* ill advised, you can install wine, and then run IE through it.
Try using chromium. If that fails, install wine and run iexplore.exe from that. I believe it should be in ~/.wine/drive_c/windows/iexplore.exe
If you don't have a conscious, then yes, it is.
